Name: 2ECONDS TO STΔRLIVHT: My Heart's Reflection
About the game: 'The day I put that uniform on, I saw myself in the mirror for the first time. And I dared to think, maybe, just maybe...' A free VN about standing up to the world to be yourself. A standalone entry in the NOISZ series, and prequel to NOISZ STΔRLIVHT. Content warning: This game contains scenes of transphobic bullying, misgendering, and family confrontation.
